title: Define Project Requirements and Scope - RFC Review
description: This RFC outlines the functionalities, user requirements, technical specifications, and constraints for the NeuralNetworkSimulationPlatform. It includes detailed descriptions of expected features, performance standards, technology choices, and potential challenges.

title: Design Neural Network Simulation Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the neural network simulation core, including input/output handling, data processing, and visualization aspects.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for users to interact with the platform, including simulation settings, visualization controls, and data input/output.

title: Implement Backend for Data Processing and Visualization
description: Develop the backend services responsible for processing neural network data, generating visualizations, and handling user requests.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend Services
description: Connect the frontend interface to the backend services for seamless interaction and data exchange.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend for Data Processing and Visualization

title: Write Unit Tests for Each Component
description: Write unit tests for all components, including frontend, backend, and visualization modules.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend for Data Processing and Visualization

title: Document the NeuralNetworkSimulationPlatform Architecture
description: Create clear and concise documentation detailing the platform's architecture, components, and their interactions.

title: Perform Code Review for NeuralNetworkSimulationPlatform
description: Review the codebase of the platform to ensure adherence to best practices, maintainability, and performance.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend for Data Processing and Visualization
